Some questions have pictures attached.\n:
Leminye imibuto ifakwe titfombe.

Shaya kancane lapha kute ukhone kubona sitfombe.
Tap close to hide the picture and go bac: Shaya kancane vala kute kutsi ufihle lesitfombe bese ubuyela emuva kusilandzeleli senchubekelembili.
You can always leave the progress tracke: Ungasishiya nanoma ngunini lesilandzeleli senchubekelembili bese ubuya ngemuva kwesikhatsi utocedzela. Tonkhe timphendvulo takho titawulondvolotwa. Shaya kancane lapha.
When you have answered all the questions: Uma sewuyiphemdvule yonkhe imibuto, ungakha umbiko wemnakekeli wemntfwana noma ungaphindza ubuke timphendvulo takho.
You can see all of your completed report: Utawubona yonkhe imibiko yakho loyicedzile kulelikhasi lelikhulu lemibiko.
